casebody.data:
Julius Lippman v. William F. Alder, Bertus U. Cain, and George D. Bernhardt. Julius Lippman v. Colorart Pictures Corporation, Ltd. (December 23, 1930.)

Pennewill, C. J., Rice and Rodney, J. J., sitting.

Clarence A. Southerland (of Ward and Gray) for plaintiff. John Biggs, Jr., for defendants. Superior Court for New Castle County, Nos. 231

and 232, September Term, 1930.

*59Pennewill, C. J.,

delivering the opinion of the court:

The motions of the defendants to set aside the judgments entered against them in the above cases, are refused. Riley v. Inter. Ban. Food Co., 185 Ill. App. 629.
